section.p: The corpse reaches out its skeletal hands, clutching your throat in a grip like a noose of ice. You struggle to break free, but your limbs have lost their strength. A ghastly chuckling pounds in your ears as the corpse feasts on your soul.

Attempt a SANCTITY roll at a Difficulty of 15 .
If the roll is successful, your spirit is too pure for the fiend to ingest: you are hurled out of the tomb with the loss of 3-18 Stamina (roll three dice). If you survive, .
If you fail the SANCTITY roll then even resurrection cannot save you from being utterly destroyed by the vampire knight.
